common_2030_top_02:
This is Geeta. How is your inspection of the
Gyms going?[npcn:11]
common_2030_select_02: Uh, how did you get my number...?[npcn:11]
common_2030_top_03a: You’ve done a wonderful job. Thank you.[npcn:11]
common_2030_top_03b:
Heh... I’m the head of the organization. I have
the addresses and contact information of every\r
Champion-ranked Trainer.[npcn:11]
common_2030_top_04:
I was informed by each of the Gym Leaders
that you stopped by to see them.[npcn:11]
common_2030_top_05:
I knew giving you this task was the right decision,
Champion [trnm:0].[npcn:11]
common_2030_top_06:
All of them seemed quite happy for the
opportunity to battle you.[npcn:11]
common_2030_top_07:
Now, I would like the inspection report from you
in person.[npcn:11]
common_2030_top_08: Join me at the academy in the entrance hall.[npcn:11]
common_2030_top_09: I will be waiting for you there.[npcn:11]
